page.title: 11THE PARISH CHURCH
page.content: The Parish Church was built in stages. The top part of the church is 65O years old and the tower which is the newest part of the church is 55O years old.The Parish Church is in Steeple Row and is the oldest church in Loughborough. When you look at the ceiling there are gold and silver angels and devils.The gold and silver pictures hold the hammer beams of the church roof. There is a great wooden door which you can't open because it has been bricked up. There is supposed to be a secret passage from the church to the antique shop over the road, but this is not very likely to be true.
